name: King of Prussia Associates et al., Appellants, v. Upper Merion Township Board of Adjustment
name_abbreviation: King of Prussia Associates v. Upper Merion Township Board of Adjustment

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: King of Prussia Associates et al., Appellants, v. Upper Merion Township Board of Adjustment.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The appeal is quashed because it was filed untimely.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Gregory J. Dean, with him James E. Meneses, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
King of Prussia Associates et al., Appellants, v. Upper Merion Township Board of Adjustment.
Argued November 20, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Charles F. Mayer, for appellant.
Gregory J. Dean, with him James E. Meneses, for appellee.
March 20, 1970:
